languages.text: К тарелкам прилипли комки штофф-опилок — токсичных отходов производства, которые иногда выдают за обычный питательный крахмал.
Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.
languages.original_text: К тарелкам прилипли комки штофф-опилок — токсичных отходов производства, которые иногда выдают за обычный питательный крахмал.

traits.locale_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.
Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.
Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

languages.text: 盘子上沾着几块锯末，这种有毒废物有时会被误当作普通的营养淀粉。
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: 盘子上沾着几块锯末，这种有毒废物有时会被误当作普通的营养淀粉。

languages.text: Hay trozos de serrín pegados a los platos, un vertido tóxico que a veces se confunde con el almidón habitual.
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: Hay trozos de serrín pegados a los platos, un vertido tóxico que a veces se confunde con el almidón habitual.

languages.text: 皿には木くずの塊がへばりついている。栄養価の高いでんぷんのように見せかけているが、ただの有毒廃棄物だ。
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: 皿には木くずの塊がへばりついている。栄養価の高いでんぷんのように見せかけているが、ただの有毒廃棄物だ。

languages.text: Auf den Tellern kleben Klumpen aus Sägemehl – giftige Abfälle, die manchmal als gewöhnliche, nahrhafte Stärke ausgegeben werden.
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: Auf den Tellern kleben Klumpen aus Sägemehl – giftige Abfälle, die manchmal als gewöhnliche, nahrhafte Stärke ausgegeben werden.

languages.text: Collés aux assiettes, vous remarquez de petits pâtés de sciure, un déchet toxique parfois utilisé en guise d'amidon alimentaire classique.
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: Collés aux assiettes, vous remarquez de petits pâtés de sciure, un déchet toxique parfois utilisé en guise d'amidon alimentaire classique.

languages.text: Topak topak olmuş talaşlar, tabaklara yapışıp kalmış. Bazen bu zehirli atıklar, sıradan ve besleyici nişasta olarak kakalanır.
languages.original_text: Stuck to the plates are lumps of sawdust — toxic waste that is sometimes passed off as ordinary nutritious starch.

traits.locale_text: Topak topak olmuş talaşlar, tabaklara yapışıp kalmış. Bazen bu zehirli atıklar, sıradan ve besleyici nişasta olarak kakalanır.
